subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Madison Square Garden announced that it would stage a heavyweight title fight Feb. 23 between Wladimir Klitschko of Ukraine and Sultan Ibragimov of Russia. The 31-year-old Klitschko (49-3, 44 knockouts) is recognized as champion by the International Boxing Federation and the International Boxing Organization. Ibragimov (22-0-1, 17 knockouts), 32, is the 2000 Olympic silver medalist and the champion of the World Boxing Organization. Their fight will unify three of the five heavyweight titles.;Madison Square Garden announced that it would stage a heavyweight title fight Feb. 23 between Wladimir Klitschko of Ukraine and Sultan Ibragimov of Russia. The 31-year-old Klitschko (49-3, 44 knockouts) is recognized as champion by the International Boxing Federation and the International Boxing Organization. Ibragimov (22-0-1, 17 knockouts), 32, is the 2000 Olympic silver medalist and the champion of the World Boxing Organization. Their fight will unify three of the five heavyweight titles.
